items.title: Delightful Feline Antics Abound: Enjoy an Excerpt of SAPHIE THE ONE-EYED CAT by JOHO
items.description: Fans of Pusheen and Chi, get to know Saphie the one-eyed cat and her feline siblings! Check out an excerpt of this all-ages graphic novel.

items.title: Department of Defense Education Activity Demands Book Bans, Curriculum Censorship in Its Schools
items.description: The Department of Defense Education Activity demands its schools remove curriculum and books related to race, gender, and more.

items.title: 3 Picture Book Biographies About Black Changemakers
items.description: These picture book biographies about Black changemakers feature a phenomenal athlete, a Wild West baddie, and a talented singer.

items.title: Get Swept Away by This Romantasy Series
items.description: Thea Guanzon's THE HURRICANE WARS series has everything I look for in fantasy: solid world-building, political intrigue, and a good love story.
